playlists.name: Building Themes
playlists.description: Atmospheric music from the various buildings and facilities around your island—from the peaceful Museum to the bustling Resident Services.

playlists.name: Dodo Airlines
playlists.description: Airport and flight-related music from Dodo Airlines—capturing the excitement of island travel and visitor arrivals.

playlists.name: K.K. Slider
playlists.description: A collection of K.K. Slider songs—original versions of the beloved musician's diverse repertoire across all genres.

playlists.name: K.K. Slider Aircheck
playlists.description: Radio-style versions of K.K. Slider songs—capturing the authentic radio broadcast experience with that distinctive aircheck sound.

playlists.name: Miscellaneous
playlists.description: Unique tracks including prologue music, character themes, special locations, and various game events that add character to your New Horizons experience.

playlists.name: Music Box
playlists.description: Instrumental music box versions of K.K. Slider songs—delicate, tinkling melodies perfect for relaxation and ambient listening.

playlists.name: Shop Themes
playlists.description: Cozy, nostalgic shop tunes from Animal Crossing: New Horizons—gentle jingles and friendly chimes that make your day feel like a stroll through Nook's Cranny.

playlists.name: Special Events
playlists.description: Festive music from holidays and special occasions throughout the year—from Bunny Day to Toy Day, capturing the joy of seasonal celebrations.
